overview: This 25 year-old Vancouver native has entranced the world with his unique ability to transform some of the greatest songs of all time into something distinctly his own. Drawing comparisons to Harry Connick, Jr. and Frank Sinatra, Michael Bublé continues in the tradition of a bygone era of songwriting and performing! The original songs performed here in the film Totally Blonde infuse the familiar styles of the past with a fresh and modern flair that will ensure Michael Bublé’s place alongside his contemporaries for years to come.
title: Michael Bublé: Totally/Bublé
